attributes.action: release all funds still outstanding to me from the DHSS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Where there are crimes there must be criminals and terror actions are committed by terrorists.
 Twenty years ago and after I was forced to prove three legal cases ,I was hounded out of Britain and turned over to the heart of terrorism .
   It is up to the British system of Justice and Courts to go to the bottom of this case-that was my demand  made to Mrs. Thatcher in my letter from Salford in 1987.
    Iam entitled to a full refund of the above funds plus the air ticket fare London-Belgrade-Tripoli(Libya) plus the last 85 pound Sterling which I surrendered in good faith and before I digested what was happenning to me.
   There has been a rumour-how true ıt is you are better equipped to understand-that there is no body above the law and Britain,s war on terror is meant to protect the innocent.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
